column1: There's a problem with the login functionality on your platform
column3: Try restarting the app. If issues persist, contact support@example.com.

column1: How do I cancel my payment and get a refund?
column3: Please provide your order ID for us to process a refund.

column1: I need help with renewing my membership.
column3: Need help with account/membership? Try resetting or renewing subscription.

column1: How can I speak with a customer support agent?
column3: Feel free to contact a human agent: 1-800-123-SUPP.
Shipping query? We can track your order or show shipping cost!

column1: My account is locked. Can you unlock it?
column3: Need help with account/membership? Try resetting or renewing subscription.

column1: How do I stop a transaction that went through?
column3: Please provide your order ID for us to process a refund.
Feel free to contact a human agent: 1-800-123-SUPP.
